_header: Father and Son and Holy Ghost / That onefold God is aye steadfast
_description: Prologue of the Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Fadir and sonne & haligasteþat anefald god es aye
                    stedfaste…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…þat it swa be sayle in wardelyePater noster . aue
                    mary

CULGg531.First Lines:
Fader and sone & þe haligastþat one fald god ay
                    stedfast…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…þat it be swa says inwerdlyA pater noster and
                        a
aue mary
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
prologus in exposiciones super dominicalibus per annum (f.
                        5v); Explicit prologus (f. 7v)

BLAdd30358.First Lines:
FAder & son & haligasteÞat anefald godd es ay
                    stedfaste…
BLAdd30358.Last Lines:
…Þat it be so says inwardlyAn þater noster Aue
                    mary

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
…Swa qwaynt and trusty made þu ittThat all bestes er rad
                    for man…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…That it so be sais inwardlyA pater noster and aue
                    mary
BLAdd38010.Note: The first folio is torn, so the first lines are missing.

EDCPCM.First Lines:
ffAder and sun and haligastþat anfald God es ay
                    stedfast…
EDCPCM.Last Lines:

                    Marie
EDCPCM.Note:
Continues same line as last, ‘Pater noster & c[etera]’
                    (f. 16va)
